articles.title: Scientists Find Mysterious Cosmic Threads In The Centre Of Milky Way - NDTV
articles.description: The discovery is based on an analysis of the data captured by South African Radio Astronomy Observatory's MeerKAT radio telescope.
articles.content:
These structures are located 2,500 light years away from Earth.
An international team of scientists has discovered hundreds of mysterious structures in the centre of the Milky Way galaxy. According … [+1848 chars]
